t: Building A $10 Million Brand On Amazon
s: September 20, 2021 - You can definitely find success through selling on Amazon, but you need to start with a plan. The marketplace can be oversaturated, and merchants might also be in a position to undercut your pricing. But pay attention to what sets you apart and how you can play on your differentiating factors.

t: Two Million Brands on Amazon - Marketplace Pulse
s: June 11, 2019 - There are close to two million different brands on Amazon. Every second it gets bombarded with new brands, new (often) fake reviews, and new sellers. In all that noise, it tries to find products consumers would like.
